attributes.action: remove the Fruit & Veg stalls encroaching on public property and give us back our pavements.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There was a time walking down my street was a nice quite stroll. Nowadays it more resembles a shanty town. 

This is due to the new idea of Fruit & Veg stalls to build steel structures and stalls on the public pavement and hence limit walking space. 

Every town this has happened in has created a eyesore and I urge you to 'give us back our streets'
